page.title: 20HOBBIES IN MELKSHAM
page.content: My hobby is collecting pen knives. I have 24 of them, including 2 sheath knives. I 2 with 5 blades. My other hobby is swimming. I go swimming some weekends and in school and also at the coast. I have lots of badges for swimming the furthest; I can swim 16 lengths of Calne pool. My last hobby is shooting. I have 2 guns of my own and my dad has 8 of them. We buy a lot of cartridges and we go shooting a lot, mostly at Potterne and Easterton. We have shot a lot of rabbits , pigeons, squirrels, pheasants and partridges. On Sundays my dad and I like to go clay pigeon shooting. Usually we shoot about 60 cartrdges each and it costs us about Â£3 for the cartridges and 25p per shot at the calys.
